price: 67. And indeed We should then have bestowed upon them a great reward from Ourselves.
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
